requirements.description: Your application or service must collect, store, process, or use end user data in compliance with the specified requirements.

You must have a privacy policy that clearly informs end users about the personal data collected and how it is used and shared, including for advertising purposes, with WeChat or Weixin and other third parties.
The privacy policy must comply with and be consistent with the terms and requirements of the Agreement and the WeChat or Weixin Privacy Policy.

type.summary: Consistency with Agreement and WeChat/Weixin Privacy Policy

requirements.description: You must obtain users' express consent before processing their personal data.

type.summary: User Consent for Personal Data Processing
